2082430.name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic - Joyous Japan
2082430.description:
2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics!

Feudal Japan themed tables with controllable bumpers.

Sly Samurai

  • Standard sized table with 1 upper playfield.
  • 2 Flippers, 2 slingshots, 12 Bumpers, 1 Stationary Target, 3 Drop Targets, 8 Teleporter Holes, 7 Rollovers, 1 Controllable Bumper.
  • Score Multiplier, Kickback

Feudal Follies

  • Ultra-Wide table with 1 upper playfield.
  • 4 Flippers, 15 Bumpers, 1 Stationary Target, 4 Drop Targets, 7 Teleporter Holes, 2 Rollovers, 1 Controllable Bumper.
  • Ball Saver, Extra Ball.

Cosmetics

  • Daring Dom: 1 new playable character (the balls handle the same, differences are visual only).
  • 6 Feudal themed accessories.
  • 6 Furs, appropriate for the time.
2082430.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 土耳其语, 意大利语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
